author: covener
msg: mod_lua: A maliciously crafted websockets PING after a script
calls r:wsupgrade() can cause a child process crash.

author: covener
msg: Fix bit-shifting of websockets frame fields that would yield wrong opcodes
when the FIN bit was set.  Results in PING not being recognized

author: vikram
msg: HIVE-9832: Merge join followed by union and a map join in hive on tez fails. (Vikram Dixit K, reviewed by Gunther Hagleitner)

author: robbie
msg: QPID-6432: when looking for the JMSType value use the message Subject first if present
